description: Try our easy to follow Honey & Vanilla Poached Pears with Tuilles recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Cooked fruit,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Vegetarian,Chocolate,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert,Pear
name: Honey & Vanilla Poached Pears with Tuilles Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To make tuilles, preheat oven to 160Â°C. Line a large baking tray with baking paper (approx. 38cm long).

Whisk egg white and sugar for 1 minute or until frothy. Add butter and honey. Whisk until well combined. Add flour and stir until mixture is smooth. Thinly spread mixture over entire area of baking paper.
Sprinkle with chocolate bits and nuts. Bake for 10 minutes or until golden and crisp. Cool on tray then break into pieces.

Combine honey, vanilla and 1 cup of water in a saucepan. Stir constantly over a medium heat until mixture comes to the boil. Peel, halve and core pears. Add to honey syrup. Reduce heat and simmer for 8-10 minutes or until tender.
Serve pears with a piece of tuille. Note: Vanilla extract is different to vanilla essence.
